deeplinkActivation.headline: Activate card
deeplinkActivation.description: Do you want to activate this card?
deeplinkActivation.limitReached: Your card limit has been reached. Please remove a card first.
deeplinkActivation.alreadyExists: This card has already been activated on this device.
deeplinkActivation.activationInvalid: The activation is in an invalid state.
deeplinkActivation.cardExpiredExceptionMessage: Your card cannot be activated because it has already expired on {{expiryDate}}
deeplinkActivation.formatExceptionMessage: The format of the activation code is invalid.

identification.activateCurrentDeviceDescription: Your card has already been activated on another device. If you continue, your card will be automatically deactivated on the other device if it is still active there.
identification.activateDescription: You have already applied for the Ehrenamtskarte and received the activation code for your digital Ehrenamtskarte? Scan the code here.
identification.applyDescription: Are you involved in voluntary work but do not yet have an Ehrenamtskarte? You can apply for your Ehrenamtskarte here.
identification.authenticationPossible: You can use this QR code to identify yourself at acceptance points:
identification.cameraAccessRequiredSettings: To scan a QR code, the app needs access to the camera. You can allow the app to access the camera in the settings.
identification.cardAlreadyActivated: The scanned QR code has already been activated.
identification.cardExpired: Your card has expired. You can apply for renewal under "More actions"
identification.cardInvalid: Your card is invalid. It has either been revoked or activated on another device.
identification.cardNotYetValid: The validity period of your card has not yet started.
identification.checkFailed: Your card could not be verified. Please make sure you have an internet connection and try again.
identification.checkingCode: The QR code is verified by a server request.
identification.codeExpired: The scanned code has already expired on {{expirationDate}}.
identification.codeRevoked: This card could not be activated as it has been revoked.
identification.codeInvalid: The content of the scanned code cannot be understood. It is probably a QR code that was not generated for this app.
identification.codeInvalidMissing: The content of the scanned code is incomplete. (Error code: {{missing}}Missing)
identification.codeInvalidType: The scanned code is not intended for activation in the app. Please use the QR code shown as activation code.
identification.codeUnknownType: The scanned code is not valid for this application.
identification.codeVerificationFailed: The scanned code could not be verified by the server.
identification.codeActivationFailedConnection: The scanned code could not be activated. Please make sure you have an internet connection and try again.
identification.codeVerificationFailedConnection: The scanned code could not be verified. Please make sure you have an internet connection and try again.
identification.compareWithID: Verify the displayed data against an official photo ID.
identification.comparedWithID: I verified the data against an official photo ID.
identification.extendCardNotificationDescription:
Your card is about to expire.
Extend it now to continue using your benefits.
identification.moreActionsActivateDescription: Your saved cards will be retained. You can remove them manually.
identification.moreActionsActivateLimitDescription: To add another Ehrenamtskarte, you must first delete an existing Ehrenamtskarte.
identification.moreActionsApplyDescription: Your saved cards will be retained.
identification.moreActionsApplyTitle: Apply for or extend an Ehrenamtskarte
identification.moreActionsRemoveDescription: After selection, this Ehrenamtskarte will be deleted from the device.
identification.moreActionsVerifyDescription: Check the validity of an Ehrenamtskarte
identification.removeDescription: If this card is deleted, it must be added again before using it again.
identification.scanCode: Scan the QR code that appears on the "Identify" tab of the other party.
identification.scanQRCode: Point the camera at the QR code.
identification.timeIncorrect: The time of your device does not seem to be correct. Please synchronize the time in the system settings.
identification.title: Identify
identification.verifyDescription: You would like to check the validity of a digital Ehrenamtskarte? Scan the code here.
identification.verifyInfoTitle: How to check the validity of an Ehrenamtskarte

intro.applyDescription: Provide information about yourself and your volunteer activity in the form. The application is then forwarded and processed by the responsible office.
intro.applyTitle: How can I apply for the Ehrenamtskarte?
intro.locationDescription: We can show your location on the map and display acceptance points in your area. If you want to use these aids, we need your consent. Your location is not stored.
intro.locationTitle: Find acceptance points in your area!
intro.usageDescription: On the map of Bavaria you can find all acceptance points. Tap on a location to be able to see more information.
intro.usageTitle: Where can I use my Ehrenamtskarte?
intro.welcomeDescription: Thank you for downloading the app for the Bayerische Ehrenamtskarte!

location.activateLocationAccessRationale: Allow the app to use your location to display acceptance points in your area.
location.grantLocation: I would like to share my location.

map.showMapCopyright: Show info about map data copyright
map.title: Map

search.noAcceptingStoresFound: No acceptance points found matching this search.
search.title: Search

store.acceptingStoreNotAvailable: This acceptance point is no longer available.
store.removeDescription: Would you like to remove it from your favorites?

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.noFavoritesFound: You have not added any acceptance points to your favorites yet.
favorites.favoriteHasBeenAdded: The acceptance point has been added to the favorites.
favorites.favoriteHasBeenRemoved: The acceptance point has been removed from the favorites.
